title: Endotracheal anaesthesia
creator_credit: Realist Films, ICI (GB) and Margaret Thomson
brief_description: Without a clear airway the administration of a general anaesthetic is impossible. This film shows how endotracheal anaesthesia overcomes this difficulty by intubation of the larynx. The advantages of endotrachael anaesthesia are summarised.
